channel.title: The Watchlist
channel.description:
This is the Watchlist. New idiots of exceptionable callibre (yet not quite of reporting callibre) should be posted HERE with these rules:
Average Exceptional Idiot: [i][b]Three[/b][/i] different quotes verifying their stupidity.
Very Exceptional Idiot: [b][i]Two[/i][/b] different quotes which [i]prove[/i] that they are of higher quality than an AEI.
Please do not deficate in the Watchlist, as you and other good people will have harder times finding idiots. The purpose of this Watchlist is that we may know who NOT to help, and in turn, possibly cut back the tide of stupidity.
(this is a test)

item.title: The Watchlist
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
Payne and Redemption:

You all should already know that a large majority of people here are homophobes (either that or closet homosexuals) because they seem so willing to have no insults other than gay jokes, and I have a feeling that people so open to talk about gay jokes just might be gay themselves. Not naming any names, but most everyone here doesn’t fit this criteria, as this has generally been a logical conversation.

Come on Medevilae, you’re exactly the type of homophobe I was talking about, and you say it should be closed because you obviously think your opinion is better than everyone else’s, so I have to disagree with you on so many levels.

Low homophobia? I hope you’re not implying that Dias isn’t homophobic.

I agree.

I agree completely.

Read full topic
